sentences.en: Bathrooms don't have to be purely functional.
sentences.cn: 浴室不必完全只为了实用。

sentences.en: buildings that are sensitively designed, not purely functional
sentences.cn: 设计细腻而非单纯实用的建筑

sentences.en: Felicity's bedroom was spartan but functional.
sentences.cn: 费莉西蒂的卧室很简朴，但非常实用。

sentences.en: Inherent in judicial review are many functional limitations.
sentences.cn: 司法审查本身带有许多固有的职能限制.

sentences.en: It contains functional groups which can exchange with ions from solution.
sentences.cn: 它含有能与溶液中离子发生交换作用的官能团.

sentences.en: One argument stresses the functional similarity between rulemaking and legislation.
sentences.cn: 一种论点强调规则制定和立法之间的功能相似性.

sentences.en: Such fences were fairly functional, but were unattractive and wasteful of land.
sentences.cn: 这种篱笆虽然实用, 却不美观,并且占地多.

sentences.en: The chairs were comfortable, functional and free of ornamentation.
sentences.cn: 这些椅子舒适实用，而且看上去不显花哨。

sentences.en: The functional perfection of its design is quite epellbinding.
sentences.cn: 它的机能之完美,真是神奇.

sentences.en: The furniture is not fancy, just functional.
sentences.cn: 这些家具不是摆着好看的, 只是为了实用.

sentences.en: The mirror is functional yet decorative.
sentences.cn: 这镜子能照人，但也有装饰作用。

sentences.en: The telephone was out of order, but is functional now.
sentences.cn: 电话刚才坏了, 但现在可以用了.

sentences.en: The two departments have slight functional differences.
sentences.cn: 这两个部门功能稍有不同。

sentences.en: Their furniture was more aesthetic than functional.
sentences.cn: 他们的家具美观多于实用。

sentences.en: We have fully functional smoke alarms on all staircases.
sentences.cn: 我们在各层楼梯都安装有完全可用的烟雾警报器。

sentences.en: We shall take a closer look at the concept of functional dependence.
sentences.cn: 我们将周密地考虑一下函数相关的概念.

功能地；函数地；职务上地
功能；[数] 函数；职责；盛大的集会
机能主义；[心理] 机能心理学；实用第一主义
机能主义者；实用主义者
功能；[数] 泛函性，函数性

功能模块；功能微型组件

功能要求；功能条件说明书
功能结构，功能式结构；机能结构；职能型结构

trans.tran_cn: 功能的，[数]函数的，有多种用途的，机能性
trans.tran_en: relating to the purpose of something
